mapper.insert: insert into t_login_log (id, logName, userId, createTime, succeed, ip, messgae) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{logname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{succeed,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{messgae,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update t_login_log set logName = #{logname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, userId = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, succeed = #{succeed,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, messgae = #{messgae,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, logName, userId, createTime, succeed, ip, messgae from t_login_log
